title: Spicy Korean Coleslaw
ingredients: 1 to 1.5Tbsp Korean fish sauce or 2 Tbsp regular soy sauce
directions: Thinly slice the cabbage. Place it into a large mixing bowl. Sprinkle some salt and gently mix the cabbage to wilt it lightly.
Add the carrots and the sauce. Mix them well. Garnish with green onion and perilla leaves.
Serve. (It works very well with Korean BBQ.) Best to consume within 24 hours of making it.
